title: Rainy night city driving, almost stopped at intersection.
caption: A blue car drives slowly on a rainy night in a city street, with a black car parked on the right side.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The blue car is driving slowly because of the rain and the presence of other cars on the street. The driver is being cautious and maintaining a safe distance from the parked black car.
